sys_ui_page.html: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <body> <!-- get parameters that were passed through here--> <j:set var="jvar_sysid" value="${sysparm_sysid}"></j:set> <j:set var="jvar_tablename" value="${sysparm_tablename}"></j:set> <j:set var="jvar_view" value="${sysparm_view}"></j:set> <j:set var="jvar_type" value="${sysparm_type}"></j:set> <j:set var="jvar_filter" value="${sysparm_filter}"></j:set> <!-- initialize iFrame and link to the target widget--> <iframe allowtransparency="true" src="developer_operations?id=dev_tools_operations${AMP}sysId=${jvar_sysid}${AMP}tableName=${jvar_tablename}${AMP}view=${jvar_view}${AMP}type=${jvar_type}${AMP}filter=${jvar_filter}" scrolling="no" width="860px" height="650px" style="border:none; overflow:auto; background: #FFFFFF;" /> </body> </j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: dev_tools_operations_ui_page
